data.title: #104: Mark and Jack Howard lock horns on two of their favourite films - Hackers and 'Burn After Reading' - sparks fly!kh | Kermode on Film
data.meta_description: Listen to #104: Mark and Jack Howard lock horns on two of their favourite films - Hackers and 'Burn After Reading' - sparks fly!kh from Kermode on Film. Mark and Jack Howard lock horns on two of their favourite films - Mark reveals why he loves 'Hackers' - Iain Softley's 1995 cult computer thriller and Jack explains the genius of the Coen Brothers 2008 screwball crime comedy 'Burn After Reading'. Warning spoilers ahoy and sparks fly!
data.text:
194. 194: This is the End: Mark and Jack Howard in conversation for the last ever Kermode on Film

01:00:15| |Season 1, Ep. 194

Mark and Jack Howard in conversation for the last ever Kermode on Film (at least for now). Their chat covers Nicolas Cage, Everything Everywhere All at Once, Sam Raimi and a whole lot more.

193. 193: Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the second half of his April MK3D show

47:06| |Season 1, Ep. 193

Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the second half of his April MK3D show including interviews with actors Jason Isaacs and Johnny Flynn about their roles in the WW2 movie Operation Mincemeat and pop culture legend Don Letts on Rebel Dread - the documentary about his extraordinary life and career.

192. 192: Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the first half of his April MK3D show

47:06| |Season 1, Ep. 192

Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the first half of his April MK3D show including interviews with director Antoneta Alamat KusijanoviÄ‡ about her Cannes prize-winning film Murina and actor Eddie Marsan on his new TV series The Thief, His Wife And The Canoe.

191. 191: The Batman Special. Mark and Jack Howard unpick the latest screen version of DC Comics character

53:44| |Season 1, Ep. 191

The Batman Special. Mark and Jack Howard unpick the latest screen version of DC Comics character starring Robert Pattinson, Zoe Kravitz and Paul Dano and directed by Matt Reeves

190. 190: Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the second half of his March MK3D show

55:24| |Season 1, Ep. 190

Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the second half of his March MK3D show with guests actress Monica Dolan and West Side Story star Rachel Zegler

189. 189: Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the first half of his March MK3D show

45:56| |Season 1, Ep. 189

Mark is live from the BFI Southbank with the first half of his March MK3D show with guests film critic Anna Smith and director Harry Wootliff talking about her new film True Things

188. 188: Design Awards Special. Mark talks to some of the winners

48:28| |Season 1, Ep. 188

Design Awards special. Mark talks to some of the winners at the recent British Film Designers Guild awards

187. 187: Spider-Man: No Way Home special. Mark and Jack Howard dissect the recent blockbuster

43:13| |Season 1, Ep. 187

Spider-Man: No Way Home special. Mark and Jack Howard discuss and dissect the recent blockbuster mega-hit based on the Marvel character.
